element.short: Medication, Substance, or Device requested to be supplied
element.definition: The item that is requested to be supplied. This is either a link to a resource representing the details of the item or a code that identifies the item from a known list.
element.comment: Note that there's a difference between a prescription - an instruction to take a medication, along with a (sometimes) implicit supply, and an explicit request to supply, with no explicit instructions.
